name: Jurassic Pet - Virtual World
description:
Download this fun game & start digging Dino Eggs today!
First visit at the park? No Problem, your advisor Greeno the Dino will help you with your first steps to become the best Jurassic tycoon!

Features:
- 3 Park areas from different Eras! (Jurassic, Triassic, Mesozoic)
- 30+ Different Dinosaur! (Carnivore, Omnivore, Hunter)
- 40+ Artefacts to discover!
- 290+ Digsites
- 10 Upgradable digging tools!
- and 6 Boosters (earthquake, damage booster, etc)
- Lucky Wheel to make some easy in game cash
- Share your park and Dino photos!

*** GET READY FOR THE EPIC DINO TYCOON TAPPING ACTION **

Your mission is to operate your park and populate with cool new jurassic animals!
To get an egg dig every map piece to find the excavation site where the Dino egg was hidden!
Dig this egg and manage your hatchery to breed your dinos faster than your friends!

Find and Hatch all the Dinos.

Jurassic Pet seemingly endless gameplay will allow you to play for an indefinite amount of time. ** HAPPY DINO EGG BREEDING ** ENJOY IT **

Thank you all for playing with Jurassic Pet game and placing feedbacks!

Got Stuck? or Got any idea to make this game better?
Drop a Review or a mail: publishing@luminet.eu

MEET US ON SOCIAL
FB: https://www.facebook.com/jurassicpetofficial/

Updates:
v2.0
- Three discoverable maps!
- More than 290 digging levels!
- Brand new design with more than 30 dinosaur species to dig and hatch!
